skill.name: designing-tests
skill.description: Designs and implements testing strategies for any codebase. Use when adding tests, improving coverage, setting up testing infrastructure, debugging test failures, or when asked about unit tests, integration tests, or E2E testing.
skill.summary: Designs and implements testing strategies for any codebase. Use when adding tests, improving coverag...
skill.author: CloudAI-X

security_audit.summary: Pure markdown skill containing only testing guidance and templates. No executable code, no network access, no filesystem operations. Safe for publication.

content.value_statement: Writing tests without a clear strategy leads to gaps in coverage and fragile test suites. This skill provides systematic templates and frameworks for unit, integration, and E2E testing across JavaScript, Python, and Go. It helps you build confidence in your code through structured testing approaches.
actual_capabilities: Design testing strategies using the testing pyramid model
Create unit, integration, and E2E test templates for multiple languages
Select appropriate testing frameworks for JS/TS, Python, and Go
Define coverage thresholds and quality gates
Implement mocking strategies and test data factories
Debug failing tests and improve test suite reliability
limitations: Does not execute tests or write code directly to user files
Does not configure CI/CD pipelines or testing infrastructure
Does not install dependencies or manage testing tools
Provides guidance only; users must implement tests themselves

use_cases.title: Add Unit Tests
use_cases.description: Generate unit test templates for new functions following ARRANGE-ACT-ASSERT pattern.

use_cases.title: Build Test Suite
use_cases.description: Design integration and E2E test strategies for critical user workflows and API contracts.

use_cases.title: Set Coverage Standards
use_cases.description: Establish coverage thresholds and testing standards for team-wide adoption.

prompt_templates.title: Write Unit Tests
prompt_templates.scenario: Add unit tests for a new function
prompt_templates.prompt: Write unit tests for this function following the testing pyramid. Include edge cases and error handling.

prompt_templates.title: Create Integration Tests
prompt_templates.prompt: Design integration tests for these API endpoints using the testing templates. Mock external dependencies.

prompt_templates.title: Improve Coverage
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this code and suggest tests to reach 80% coverage. Prioritize business logic and critical paths.

prompt_templates.title: Setup Testing
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me set up testing infrastructure with Vitest for TypeScript. Include coverage thresholds and configuration.

best_practices: Write tests that verify behavior, not implementation details
Focus 70% of effort on unit tests for business logic
Ensure tests are independent and can run in any order
anti_patterns: Testing implementation details instead of observable behavior
Mixing unit and integration test concerns in the same file
Using real external services instead of mocked dependencies

faq.question: What programming languages are supported?
faq.answer: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and Go with framework recommendations for each.

faq.question: What coverage targets should I set?
faq.answer: Start with 80% overall coverage. Critical business logic may require 95%+.

faq.question: How does this integrate with my IDE?
faq.answer: This skill generates test templates. Copy them to your IDE and run tests locally.

faq.question: Is my code data collected?
faq.answer: No. This skill processes code only in your local session. Nothing is transmitted externally.

faq.question: Why are my tests failing?
faq.answer: Common causes: missing dependencies, environment issues, or test setup problems. Check test output for specifics.

faq.question: How is this different from test generation AI?
faq.answer: This skill teaches testing strategy and patterns. It does not auto-generate tests but guides you to write effective ones.
